definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: I will be the first to admit I was a distance education skeptic.
sentences.chinese: 首先得承認，我曾經是一個遠程教育的懷疑派。

sentences.english: Sceptics point out that due process requires discretion.
sentences.chinese: 懷疑派則指出應該謹慎推行公開化。

sentences.english: How have the usual suspects responded?
sentences.chinese: 慣常的懷疑派如何迴應這個問題？

sentences.english: The usual suspects will, of course, denounce such ideas as irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 當然，一貫懷疑派會譴責這種想法是不負責任。

sentences.english: Events since the elections have proved the skeptics right.
sentences.chinese: 一系列事件證明懷疑派是正確的。
